body:
Title explains most of it. I have currently joined 8 guilds, but for some reason I can't join any more. Whenever I press the join button it shows a Red panel with an exclamation point on it. This happened on both mobile browser (IOS) and desktop. Is this supposed to happen?
Edit: Has been resolved. Thank you Ruqqus staff
body_html: Title explains most of it. I have currently joined 8 guilds, but for some reason I can't join any more. Whenever I press the join button it shows a Red panel with an exclamation point on it. This happened on both mobile browser (IOS) and desktop. Is this supposed to happen? Edit: Has been resolved. Thank you Ruqqus staff

title: Is there a limit on the number of guilds you can be a part of? I currently can't join any new guilds.

author.bio: Traps ~~aren't~~ are gay, and I don't care
author.bio_html: Traps aren't are gay, and I don't care

body: That's not supposed to happen, I'm in loads of guilds lol

post.title: Is there a limit on the number of guilds you can be a part of? I currently can't join any new guilds.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
That's a server error. It appears to be fixed now.

There is no limit on how many guilds you can join. There is, however, a limit of 10 guilds you can be a guildmaster of.
body_html:
That's a server error. It appears to be fixed now.

There is no limit on how many guilds you can join. There is, however, a limit of 10 guilds you can be a guildmaster of.
